def burrows_wheeler_transform(s):

def burrows_wheeler_transform(s):
    rotations = [s[i:] + s[:i] for i in range(len(s))]
    rotations.sort()
    bwt = ''.join((rot[--1] for rot in rotations))
    return bwt
